description:
The truth that Teratsuki Kyouichirou just revealed in the video... He explains that what`s happening in the Moon Temple right now is a collaboration between him and the King of Distortion. Niitoki Kei manages to make it to the top floor and she and Boogiepop encounter the actual King of Distortion. After seeing who the real King of Distortion is, Boogiepop realizes why he knew who Boogiepop was. The King of Distortion tells them that this is merely an experiment and that he doesn`t mean to harm anyone, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: オーバードライブ 歪曲王 5
